code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./ResultsLookup.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function ResultsLookup(){const[code,setCode]=useState('');const[error,setError]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!code.trim()){setError('Please enter a poll code.');return;}setError('');navigate(`/poll/${code.trim()}/results`);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"results-lookup-page",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"results-lookup-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"View Poll Results"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"results-lookup-form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",className:"results-input",placeholder:"Enter poll code...",value:code,onChange:e=>setCode(e.target.value),autoFocus:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"results-btn",children:"View Results"})]}),error&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"results-error",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"results-hint",children:"Ask the poll creator for the code or link."})]})});}
